description.value:
You have sworn service to a powerful witch known as a Sorceress, and you have a first-hand knowledge of how their magic works. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against curses, and to saving throws against spells cast by a witch or hag. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a curse or a spell cast by a witch or hag, you get a critical success instead.

Additionally, you gain a common or uncommon cantrip of your choice from the spellcasting tradition of the Sorceress you have sworn service to.

rules.label: Sorcerous Knight (vs Curses and Spells from Witches & Hags)

value.value: Sworn to a Sorceress, or serving another powerful magic user
